thread.title: John
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by John

author: John
title: John
text: Merry was very knowledgeable about the homeowners' insurance we needed for the purchase of our new home. She was thorough and covered everything. After we had completed the interview, she informed us that we could save money by bundling our car insurance with the homeowners' insurance. Then she asked us to wait while she received our Quote: . It didn't seem that it took more than one minute and we had our Quote: from a very highly rated insurance company. We are very pleased and would recommend SelectQuote: to anyone. :)
